definition[0]: able to be trusted and depended on
definition[1]: if someone is trustworthy, you can trust them because they are honest
example[0]: Many people do not see politicians as trustworthy.
definition[2]: someone who is reliable  can be trusted to do what they say they will do and not make any mistakes
example[2]: We need someone who is 100% reliable.
definition[3]: someone who is responsible can be trusted to behave in a sensible way
example[3]: Sam’s a good babysitter – he’s responsible and the kids like him.
definition[4]: someone who is dependable can be trusted to do what you need or expect
example[5]: Britain is our most dependable ally.
definition[5]: someone who is steady is sensible and you can depend on them
example[6]: He’s only sixteen, but he’s steady and reliable.
definition[6]: someone who is loyal  can be trusted to always give help or support to their friends, their country, their political party etc
example[7]: She is fiercely loyal to her family.
example[8]: He is one of the party’s most loyal supporters.
definition[7]: someone who is faithful stays loyal to a person, belief, political party etc, and continues to support them, even in difficult situations
example[9]: Daniel had been a faithful friend.
example[10]: a faithful member of the Communist Party
definition[8]: if you can rely or depend on someone, you can be sure that they will do what you want or need them to do
example[11]: Don’t worry about a thing – you can depend on me.
example[12]: Patients rely on doctors to help them make the right decisions about their health care.
definition[9]: able to be trusted to do what you want, or to be accurate
example[13]: The Boeing is a very reliable plane.
example[16]: How can we be sure that his evidence is reliable?
definition[10]: if something is trustworthy, you know that it is true or accurate
definition[11]: if you can rely or depend on something, you can be sure that they will do what you want or need them to do
example[19]: I need a car that I can rely on in all weathers.
definition[12]: a person or organization that is trustworthy can be trusted and depended upon
example[20]: The staff are honest, trustworthy, intensely loyal and hard-working.
